Title: Relates to the identification of Asian Lunar New Year and the declaration of such day as a public holiday
Summary: Directs the secretary of the senate and the clerk of the assembly to identify the date of Asian Lunar New Year; declares such day as a public holiday each year.
LawCode: Amd ยง15, Leg L; amd ยง24, Gen Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law and the general construction law, in relation to the identification of Asian Lunar New Year and the declaration of such day as a public holiday
